name: Gawker Network Declutterizer
description: Cleans up some of the Gawker Network sites.
additional_info:
Sites supported
  • Gizmodo
  • Jalopnik
  • io9
  • Gawker
  • Lifehacker
Improvements
  • Top Bar stays on top
  • Main article in a single column
  • Comments on a single column
  • No Sidebar, no footer
  • Full Size images
  • No Related articles
  • Bonus: Main Page also decluttered
